TopicTitle: It's a Saturday night and I ain't got nobody

Articles.Content: There's not at least one live streamer on twitch doing KSP? There's four different games live, but none KSP, on the KSP forum?! I don't get it.

Watch some Factorio or EU IV or something. There are plenty of other games and streamers out there.

Or hell, play something yourself.

hmm... a crazy solution - eh... if nobody's streaming KSP - just uh, bear with me here for a bit - this may sound a bit odd but: have you considered (crazy far fetched concept) playing it yourself?

:sticktongue: j/k of course

LOL -- reminds me of that South Park episode where Kyle wants to play CoD with his lil' brother, but can't get him to stop watching the streamers playing the same game on youtube...

It's saturday -- I went to the Mun twice already... then came back -- it was really more like ten times to "break in" the new design... 'til then, there was a lot of:

"OMG, they killed Kerman! -- You Bastards!"

Fly safe out there -- I probably won't, or maybe, well let's find out! *hits Ã‚Â«LAUNCHÃ‚Â» for googol'th time*

Cheers

Edited September 6, 2015 by Moach
Sometimes you just don't want to use your brain. Playing KSP requires that... so, pizza, beer & something to watch... yep, I can relate... not on that Twitch thing that I hate, but yeah...
As this is not actually about KSP itself, the thread has been moved to the off-topic lounge. (I hope the rest of your evening is more exciting.)
Earlier today several of us did a bunch of KSP streams. Right now we're doing one last Rocket League stream for the night, with me and Avera9ejoe playing it if you want to watch.

Iv'e already killed "Kenny" a couple of times tonight. Just wanting to watch some new ideas on how not to kill Kenny. Been playin' the hell out of KSP!

- - - Updated - - -

Earlier today several of us did a bunch of KSP streams. Right now we're doing one last Rocket League stream for the night, with me and Avera9ejoe playing it if you want to watch.

Thank you for that suggestion. I'll certainly look into that stream. Didn't know I'd get sanctioned for making a neutral statement. If this isn't about KSP, I don't know what is.

Edited September 6, 2015 by SpacedCowboy
Wow , ok, didn't realize wanting to watch something KSP wasn't KSP. Especially enjoyed your cruel comment there too. real exciting.
EJ_SA's streaming, and he's my favorite streamer.

I've not watched a live stream yet. Anybody's. All total, I've watched two YouTube KSP videos... both of which were, of course, Scott Manley's. That was enough for me (to get me started). Thank you Scott. I'd rather play.
I'm not everytime in a mood to play KSP. Sometimes, when I finally get home, or I have no idea what to do, I just watch a stream and not design spaceships and fly them.
